comments:
The Java editor throws a number of these while editing. Once this happens corrected errors are not cleared (i.e. annotation engine seems to fail). This was a one off - I have not been able to recreate it (yet). I had to close the editor and open it again to get rid of the problem.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Open a java editor on the attached source file.
2) It contains many errors. (Wrong copy/paste)
3) Select the code from the end of the main method (after the closing brace) to the end of the compilation unit.
4) Click on Delete. You should get a failure.

Great test case!

Fixed in HEAD.
Available in builds > 3.3 M4 / N20070104-0010.

This needs to be backported to R3_2_maintenance because the code that break is also new in that branch.
